result.execSummary:
The defendant Joshua M Kaplan was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine and costs to paid at $50.00 per month commencing 8/1/16 and each month thereafter or penalty of 11 days jail for non payment.

Costs to be paid along with fine payments.

  Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joshua M Kaplan

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
From Atty Kuchler dated 6/2/16 re the return of property, no need for restitution hearing.
Reviewed by Judge Aprahamian 6/7/16.

Defendant Joshua M Kaplan in court with attorney Donna Jean Kuchler.  Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State makes recommendations.  Attorney Kuchler makes statements.  Defendant makes statements.  The Court Orders the Following to count #2:
FINE: $316.00
DNA Surcharge: $200.00
DNA Sample ordered and to be provided immediately if in custody or within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department. 
Total costs/fine/forfeiture: to be paid at the rate of $50.00 per month commencing 8/1/2016 .  Failure to pay;  the Court orders the defendant to serve 11 days in jail
Sentencing hearing on June 1, 2016 at 02:00 pm.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.
Treatment letter filed.

Defendant Joshua M Kaplan in court with attorney Donna Jean Kuchler.  Lindsey Hirt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 2.  Court strikes the enhancer and finds defendant guilty.   Counts #1, 3 and 4 are dismissed and read into count #2. The Court schedules a separate sentencing date to comply with victim notification. Sentencing hearing scheduled for June 1, 2016 at 02:00 pm.
Hearing at 04-25-2016 10:00 am

Defendant Joshua M Kaplan in court with attorney Donna Jean Kuchler.  Andrea M Will appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Kuchler advises the Court they have reached a resolution of the case which involves the Defendant is set to enroll in domestic violence counseling and there is an offer to amend to one criminal count.  The Court recalls the case with the same appearances.  Attorney Will informs the Court that the victim is in agreement wit the adjournment request.  The Court adjourns the trial and sets the matter for a hearing in about 45 days to review status of treatment.  Hearing scheduled for April 25, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Filed by the State. Witness list attached.
Filed by defense.
Jury status hearing at 03-03-2016 08:30 am
Jury trial - 12 person at 03-15-2016 08:15 am

Defendant Joshua M Kaplan in court with attorney Donna Jean Kuchler.  Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Kuchler has received the discovery and requests the Court set the matter for trial.  Jury status hearing scheduled for March 3, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for March 15, 2016 at 08:15 am.
From State dated 12/3/15 re all information in possession of State has been provided to defense.
Hearing at 01-05-2016 08:30 am

Defendant Joshua M Kaplan in court with attorney Donna Jean Kuchler.  Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Kuchler advises the Court that she has received the DVD/discovery she was waiting for but it did not pertain to the case and is still waiting for the discovery and response from the State.    The State advises the Court they have provided all discovery to Attorney Kuchler.  The Court addresses the motion to compel filed by Attorney Kuchler.  The State to follow up with 6A and 6B and 7 and provide the parties with confirmation of information by December 14, 2015.  Hearing scheduled for January 5, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Hearing at 11-30-2015 01:30 pm
First Omnibus Motion to Compel Discovery filed by defendant.

Defendant Joshua M Kaplan in court with attorney Donna Jean Kuchler.  David John Behm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Kuchler advises the Court she is waiting for discovery and filed a motion with the Court last week to address the discovery. The Court sets the matter for a hearing in two weeks to address the issue of discovery.  Hearing scheduled for November 30, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Hearing at 11-16-2015 09:00 am

Defendant Joshua M Kaplan in court with attorney Donna Jean Kuchler.  Abbey Nickolie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense has some discovery and is missing some discovery. State to provide discovery in approximately one week. Court will give a date in 30 days. Defense to advise on the next date how they will proceed.  Hearing scheduled for November 16, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Hearing at 10-14-2015 09:00 am
Defendant waives his/her right to a Preliminary Hearing.
Defendant Joshua M Kaplan in court with attorney Donna Jean Kuchler.  Brian Juech appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Hearing scheduled for October 14, 2015 at 09:00 am.
signed by Judge Aprahamian.
Request to have Subpoena Duces Tecum signed.
Preliminary hearing on September 4, 2015 at 08:15 am.

Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness listed in the Criminal Complaint.  Cash bail previously posted to be refunded to poster.

Defendant Joshua M Kaplan in court with attorney Jeffery Jeffrey J. Szczewski for attorney Donna Jean Kuchler.  Lindsey Hirt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary Hearing requested  Preliminary time limits waived.  Received Subpoena Duces Tecum.  Commissioner to review.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 4, 2015 at 08:15 am.
